definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be-spread, deck (cf. Ar. rabada v. shew patches of colour, become clouded (of sky); NH [[רׂבֶד]] pavement, paved terrace, Targum [[רוֹבֵדָא]] pavement);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[מַרְבֵרִּים רָבֵדְתִּי]] [[עַרְשִׂי]] Pr 7:16 with spreads (coverlets) have I be spread my couch; read also  Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִרְבְּדוּ]] [[לְשָׁאוּל]] 1Sa 9:25 LXX Th We Dr al. (for MT [[וַיְדַבֵּר]]) ´[[עִם שׁ]]:, obj. om.
